page.shortlink: api client api a5 buttonlist insertbuttons method

argument.name: value
argument.description: The value of the button in the button list after which to insert the new buttons.

argument.name: buttons
argument.description: An array of object containing the text, icon(s), state and value of each button to insert to the button list. See *[link:A5.ButtonList]* for details on the contents of the objects.

page.description: Insert buttons into the button list.
page.example: // assume "colorsBtnList" is an A5.ButtonList colorsBtnList.insertButtons('red',[{html: 'Purple', value: 'purple'},{html: 'Yellow', value: 'yellow'}]);
